subject: URGENT: Reset your password now
body:
Dear user,

Your account will be locked in 24 hours. Please click here to reset immediately.
label: phishing

subject: Your Amazon order #456789 has been shipped
body:
Hello Yeswanth,

Your order of Noise Cancelling Headphones has been shipped and will arrive by 20th Sept.
label: safe

subject: Final Notice: Your tax refund is pending
body: We noticed your tax refund has not been claimed. Submit your details here before 11:59 PM.
label: phishing

subject: Meeting Reminder: Project Review at 4 PM
body: Hi team, just a reminder that our project review call is at 4 PM today. Please join via the official Zoom link.
label: safe

subject: Congratulations! You have won an iPhone 15
body: Dear customer, you have been selected as the lucky winner of a brand new iPhone 15. Click here to claim your prize.
label: phishing
